manufacturer: Big Bear American Made Choppers, Inc.

products.manufacturer: Big Bear American Made Choppers, Inc.

summary: DT:  THE CONTACT STATED THE REAR SWING ARM WELD BROKE.  THIS HOLDS THE REAR FENDER ON, KEEPING IT OFF THE TIRE.  WHILE DRIVING AROUND THE BLOCK HEARD A SQUEALING NOISE  AND SMELLED BURNING RUBBER.  HE CONTACTED BIG BEAR, AND THEY SAID THEY WOULD FIX THE WELD, BUT HE WOULD HAVE TO DISMANTLE THE MOTORCYCLE AND SEND IN THE PART.  THIS CAUSED A BURN IN THE PAINT JOB.  THIS IS A 2005 BIG BEAR CHOPPER VENOM, TITLED AS A SELF ASSEMBLED VEHICLE.  *AK  UPDATED 11/29/2005 - *NM
